bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of having fallen into water or of open sores that have been affected by water which eventually brings forth a disease. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gu wen qian 古文錢 quotes Ren cun tang jing yan fang 仁存堂經驗方 : 傷水喘急，因年少飲冷水驚恐所致者 , “If someone is harmed by water and pants hastily, this is because this person consumed cold water and was terrified in his youth”.
